character.name: Dyna
description: A fire ant demolition expert. Sheï¿½s trigger-happy and eager to help out just for the sake of blowing up more things.

description.Damage: Additionally hits parts up to {{Range}} away for {{Damage}} damage.
description.StunDamage: Additionally hits parts up to {{Range}} away for {{Damage}} damage, stunning them.
description.Stun: Additionally hits parts up to {{Range}} away, stunning them.

FireCharge.name: Fire Charge
FireCharge.description: Fire a <c=parttrait>charge</c> from your missile bay. The charge will stick to the enemy ship or deal damage to a <c=midrow>midrow object</c>. The charge will trigger when shot upon or upon collision with another charge.

Demo.name: Demo Charge
Demo.description: Makes the ship part <c=parttrait>weak</c> when triggered.

Shatter.name: Shatter Charge
Shatter.description: Makes the ship part <c=parttrait>brittle</c> when triggered.
